original: grong khyer du gshegs pa na sems can rnams bde bar gyur pa dang // sil snyan rnams ma dkrol bar sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: grong khyer du gshegs pa na sems can rnams bde bar gyur pa dang // sil snyan rnams ma dkrol bar sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: When he entered the city, the beings there were happy, and musical instruments sounded without being played.

original: dbang po ma tshang ba tshang ba dang / 'od gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dbang po ma tshang ba tshang ba dang / 'od gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The fact that those with incomplete faculties became complete and obtained bright light is the perfection of patience.

original: 'od zer mtha' yas pa 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: 'od zer mtha' yas pa 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The fact that he emitted infinite rays of light is the perfection of effort.

original: yul yangs pa can kyi phyi dang nang logs su sangs rgyas brgyad khri gzhi stong sprul pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: yul yangs pa can kyi phyi dang nang logs su sangs rgyas brgyad khri gzhi stong sprul pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The fact that he emanated eighty-four thousand buddhas inside and outside the city of Vaishali is the perfection of meditation.

original: 'khor brgyad po rnams la dus su chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'khor brgyad po rnams la dus su chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The fact that he taught the Dharma to the eight assemblies at the right time is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par rol pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /üîΩde la gting dpag dka' @138a *//
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par rol pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go / de la gting dpag dka' @138a *//
translated: These are the six perfections of play.

original: ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of being difficult to fathom?

original: spyod pa la tshang gzung bar mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: spyod pa la tshang gzung bar mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The generosity of a bodhisattva is that which cannot be contained by any conduct.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen par dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen par dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality of a bodhisattva is that which is difficult for the Blessed Buddhas to approach.

original: bsam pa chud mi za zhing 'dzin pa la pha rol gnon pa ni /
analyzed: bsam pa chud mi za zhing 'dzin pa la pha rol gnon pa ni /
translated: The patience of a bodhisattva is that which is not wasted in thought, and which is victorious in the face of all adversaries.

original: dper na / gnod sbyin 'dul zhing glang po che nor skyong dang // sbrul gdug pa btul nas 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa sbyin no /üîΩzhes tshig gis smras pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dper na / gnod sbyin 'dul zhing glang po che nor skyong dang // sbrul gdug pa btul nas 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa sbyin no / zhes tshig gis smras pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: For example, when the yak·π£a Dh≈´maketu was subdued, he said, ‚ÄòI will give you fearlessness.‚Äô

original: 'od zer can du moonggal gyi bu chen po'i ma btul ba dang / tshur gshegs pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed gyi tshal nang du lhung bzed kyi chu pho ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: 'od zer can du moonggal gyi bu chen po'i ma btul ba dang / tshur gshegs pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed gyi tshal nang du lhung bzed kyi chu pho ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of a bodhisattva is that which is like the great MaudgalyƒÅyana‚Äôs subduing the yak·π£i·πáƒ´ ƒÄ·π≠avika and the nƒÅga ApalƒÅla, and then saying, ‚ÄòCome here!‚Äô

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa; sems bzhi skyes nas zhig go /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa; sems bzhi skyes nas zhig go /
translated: ≈öƒÅriputra said, ‚ÄòThe four thoughts have already arisen and passed away.‚Äô

original: smras pa / tshad med pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: smras pa / tshad med pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: He replied, ‚ÄòThe immeasurables are the meditation of a bodhisattva.‚Äô

original: 'di lta ste //
analyzed: 'di lta ste //
translated: It is as follows.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas nam phyed na 'phrin las mdzad par gyur pa ni gnam lcags phab kyang grong khyer gyi ma dad pa rnams btul nas sang ni nges mngon par shes pa drug gi chos bshad par bya'o zhes pa de ni shes rab kyi ste; 'di dag ni
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas nam phyed na 'phrin las mdzad par gyur pa ni gnam lcags phab kyang grong khyer gyi ma dad pa rnams btul nas sang ni nges mngon par shes pa drug gi chos bshad par bya'o zhes pa de ni shes rab kyi ste; 'di dag ni
translated: The Thus-Gone One‚Äôs activity at midnight, when he subdued the non-believers of the city by bringing down a thunderbolt and announced that the following day he would teach the Dharma of the six higher perceptions, was due to his insight.

original: gting dpag dka' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: gting dpag dka' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that are difficult to fathom.

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi drug tshan bco brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi drug tshan bco brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the eighteen sets of six regarding the eighteen unique qualities of the Buddha?

original: de la ca co med @138b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ca co med @138b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of being free from chatter?

original: 'di ltar rgya cher ston pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar rgya cher ston pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The teaching of the extensive is the perfection of generosity.

original: 'od mngon par 'du byed pa rnam pa gsum ston pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;gzhan gyi rgyud dag la gnod sems med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'od mngon par 'du byed pa rnam pa gsum ston pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;gzhan gyi rgyud dag la gnod sems med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The teaching of the three types of manifest light is the perfection of discipline. The absence of malice toward others‚Äô mindstreams is the perfection of patience.

original: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tshim par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tshim par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that I satisfy them according to their thoughts.

original: sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi myong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi myong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that I taste the honey of the bees.

original: rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral bar ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral bar ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that I teach w ithout attachm ent or aversion.

original: 'di dag ni ca co med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ca co med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of being w ithout chatter.

original: de la bsnyel ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bsnyel ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: W hat are the six param itas of being w ithout forgetfulness?

original: dran pa rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dran pa rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one‚Äôs m ind is never interrupted.

original: ji lta ba bzhin yongs su bsngo ba'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin yongs su bsngo ba'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one‚Äôs m ind is never forgetful of the com plete dedication of the Dharma.

original: sbyor ba kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one‚Äôs application is w ithout sin.

original: chos thams cad mngon par go bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad mngon par go bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one com prehends all the Dharmas.

original: dus gsum du ma bsnyel ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dus gsum du ma bsnyel ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation is the m editation that never forgets the three times.

original: gsung rab ma bsnyel ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: gsung rab ma bsnyel ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the w isdom that never forgets the scriptures.

original: 'de dag ni bsnyel ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'de dag ni bsnyel ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of never forgetting.

original: de la sems mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩsems la @139a *//
analyzed: de la sems mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / sems la @139a *//
translated: What are the six paramitas of the mind being in equipoise?

original: skye ba med par mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: skye ba med par mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the giving that is the m aturation of the m ind being in equipoise.

original: zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩphrad pas chog shes pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //üîΩgzhan la phan pa rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // phrad pas chog shes pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o // gzhan la phan pa rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the morality of the m ind being in equipoise.üîΩThe param ita of patience is the patience of the m ind being in equipoise.üîΩThe param ita of effort is the effort of the m ind being in equipoise.

original: sems tshar bcad cing kun tu 'dzin pa nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sems tshar bcad cing kun tu 'dzin pa nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation is the m editation of the m ind being in equipoise.

original: dus thams cad du bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin lhun gyis grub par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: dus thams cad du bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin lhun gyis grub par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the spontaneous and constant abiding in accordance with one's thoughts.

original: 'di dag ni sems mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sems mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the mind in meditative equipoise.

original: de la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of equanimity without examination?

original: bsam pa grub pa btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bsam pa grub pa btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is the equanimity of accomplishing one's thoughts.

original: pha rol po gzhan la rag las pa la btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: pha rol po gzhan la rag las pa la btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of discipline is the equanimity of not depending on others.

original: snying rje'i yo byad btang snyoms pa ni; dper na byang chub kyi snying po lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: snying rje'i yo byad btang snyoms pa ni; dper na byang chub kyi snying po lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the equanimity of the equipment of compassion, as in the case of the seat of enlightenment.

original: thams cad btang snyoms ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: thams cad btang snyoms ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the equanimity of not abandoning anything.

original: chos ston pa na btang snyoms ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: chos ston pa na btang snyoms ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is the equanimity of teaching the Dharma.

original: chos bshad pa byas nas lus kyis gdams ngag ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu @139b phyin pa ste //
analyzed: chos bshad pa byas nas lus kyis gdams ngag ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu @139b phyin pa ste //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the instruction given by the body after having explained the Dharma.

original: 'di dag ni so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of equanimity without discrimination.

original: de la tha dad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang zhe na //
analyzed: de la tha dad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang zhe na //
translated: What are the six perfections of non-differentiation?

original: tha dad pa'i 'du shes kyis mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i 'du shes kyis mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of giving is the non-arising of differentiation.

original: de bzhin nyid du 'du shes pas phyin ci ma log par skye ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du 'du shes pas phyin ci ma log par skye ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the non-erroneous arising of the perception of suchness.

original: yod pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the perception of non-existence.

original: bdag gi lus dang gzhan gyi lus la 'khrul pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gi lus dang gzhan gyi lus la 'khrul pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the non-confusion regarding one‚Äôs own body and the bodies of others.

original: dus shes pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dus shes pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is the knowledge of time.

original: thams cad de'i ngo bo ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: thams cad de'i ngo bo ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: That which is not the essence of all of them is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni tha dad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni tha dad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are not separate.

original: de la 'dun pa yongs nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la 'dun pa yongs nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: What are the six perfections that are not lost to desire?

original: pha rol la phan par 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: pha rol la phan par 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is the desire to benefit others.

original: bdag la phan par 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: bdag la phan par 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the desire to benefit oneself.

original: chos kyi gzhi la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos kyi gzhi la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the desire for the basis of the Dharma.

original: dus thams cad du 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dus thams cad du 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the desire for all times.

original: sred pa spong ba la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sred pa spong ba la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is the desire to abandon craving.

original: chos mthong ba la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /üîΩ'di dag ni 'dun pa yongs su nyams @140a *//
analyzed: chos mthong ba la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste / 'di dag ni 'dun pa yongs su nyams @140a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the desire to see the Dharma.

original: med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are not lost to desire.

original: de la brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: What are the six paramitas of never declining in one's efforts?

original: thams cad du song ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: thams cad du song ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the effort that goes everywhere.

original: gzhan dad par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan dad par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //

original: gdul ba'i dus la sdod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gdul ba'i dus la sdod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the effort that waits for the right time to tame.

original: chos lta ba mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //üîΩyig 'bru ston pa zad mi shes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: chos lta ba mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o // yig 'bru ston pa zad mi shes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is never giving up the view of the Dharma.üîΩThe param ita of m editation is the effort that is inexhaustible in teaching the syllables.

original: don ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: don ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the effort that never fails to understand the m eaning.

original: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of never declining in one‚Äôs efforts.

original: de la dran pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dran pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of never declining in one‚Äôs mindfulness?

original: dran pa la rnyog pa med pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dran pa la rnyog pa med pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one‚Äôs mindfulness is unclouded.

original: thag ring po dran pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩrigs pa ji lta ba bzhin dran pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: thag ring po dran pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // rigs pa ji lta ba bzhin dran pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one‚Äôs mindfulness is far-reaching.üîΩThe m aturation of this patience is that one‚Äôs mindfulness is in accord with reason.

analyzed: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin dran pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one‚Äôs mindfulness is in accord with one‚Äôs aspirations.

analyzed: 'jug par byed pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one‚Äôs m indfulness is engaged.

original: yongs su gcod pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this wisdom is that one‚Äôs m indfulness is decisive.

analyzed: 'di dag ni @140b dran pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

original: tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one‚Äôs samadhi is to u n d er¬≠ stand the im m easurables.

original: yang dag pa'i spong ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de dag ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i spong ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de dag ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The samadhi that takes up the right efforts is that of morality.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The samadhi that takes up the mindfulnesses is that of patience.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The samadhi that takes up the bases of spiritual power is that of vigor.

original: bsam gtan yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The samadhi that takes up the trances is that of contemplation.

original: bden pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: bden pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The samadhi that takes up the truths is that of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the non-decline of samadhi.

original: de la shes rab yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la shes rab yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the non-decline of wisdom?

original: dbang po yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dbang po yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The wisdom that takes up the powers is that of giving.

original: stobs yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: stobs yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The praj√±ƒÅ of upholding the branches of awakening is the perfection of patience.

original: lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The praj√±ƒÅ of upholding the path is the perfection of diligence.

original: @141a *// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: @141a *// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The praj√±ƒÅ of upholding dependent origination is the perfection of concentration.

original: stobs bcu yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: stobs bcu yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The praj√±ƒÅ of upholding the ten powers is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni shes rab yongs su nyams ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni shes rab yongs su nyams ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the non-degeneration of wisdom.

original: de la rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of the non-degeneration of liberation?

original: lus nyam chung ba yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lus nyam chung ba yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The non-degeneration of a weak body is the perfection of generosity.

original: tshogs kyi nang na gnas pas yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi nang na gnas pas yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality of the bodhisattva is the absence of regression in the midst of the assembly.

original: ma 'dres par gnas pas yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: ma 'dres par gnas pas yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of the bodhisattva is the absence of regression in the midst of solitude.

original: gzhan kyi gnas thob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan kyi gnas thob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of the bodhisattva is the attainment of the stage of others.

original: zad pa shes pas legs par byas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: zad pa shes pas legs par byas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation of the bodhisattva is the good action of the knowledge of destruction.

original: mi skye ba shes pas bag chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: mi skye ba shes pas bag chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The wisdom of the bodhisattva is the absence of traces through the knowledge of non-arising.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the absence of regression in liberation.

original: de la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the absence of regression in the vision of the knowledge of liberation?

original: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba gang @141b yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba gang @141b yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving of the bodhisattva is the vision of the knowledge of liberation according to one‚Äôs intention.

original: sdom pa med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sdom pa med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality is the seeing of the vow.

original: 'dod par 'gyur ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'dod par 'gyur ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience is the seeing of the desirable.

original: sa dang sa pa yin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sa dang sa pa yin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort is the establishment of the fruit of the stages.

original: skye ba rnam par bzhag pa la mi slob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: skye ba rnam par bzhag pa la mi slob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation is the non-training in the establishment of birth.

original: chos gos kyi tha mas khyer ba na yongs su nyams pa med pa'i shes rab rnam par grol ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: chos gos kyi tha mas khyer ba na yongs su nyams pa med pa'i shes rab rnam par grol ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The wisdom is the liberation of the wisdom of non-regression when one is carrying the last of the robes.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the seeing of the wisdom of liberation without regression.

original: de la lus kyi las ye shes kyis rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la lus kyi las ye shes kyis rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: What are the six perfections of the physical actions following after wisdom?

original: lus kyi las ma 'khrul pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lus kyi las ma 'khrul pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving is the non-delusion of the physical actions.

original: lus kyi las nges pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: lus kyi las nges pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of morality is the certainty of the action of the body.

original: bag chags kyis 'gyur ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bag chags kyis 'gyur ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is the absence of change due to habitual tendencies.

original: gcig tu dge ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: gcig tu dge ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the single virtue.

original: skye bo mang po la rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: skye bo mang po la rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditation is the ripening of many beings.

original: lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis gdams ngag ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis gdams ngag ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the teaching of instruction through the miracles of the body.

original: 'di dag ni lus kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lus kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the action of the body following wisdom.

original: @142a *// de la dag gi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: @142a *// de la dag gi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the action of speech following wisdom?

original: ngag 'khrul pa med par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: ngag 'khrul pa med par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of giving is the arising of speech without error.

original: thams cad du song ba'i dbyangs gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: thams cad du song ba'i dbyangs gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //

original: 'khor dga' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'khor dga' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is the delight of the retinue.

original: kun tu sgrog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: kun tu sgrog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one‚Äôs words are proclaimed everywhere.

original: mos par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: mos par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one‚Äôs words are accepted.

original: re ba la ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: re ba la ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one‚Äôs words are taught w ithout hope of reward.

original: 'di dag ni ngag gi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ngag gi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the activity of speech that is in accord w ith w isdom.

original: de la yid kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yid kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the activity of mind that is in accord w ith w isdom?

original: yid kyi las rang bzhin gyis rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: yid kyi las rang bzhin gyis rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that the activity of the m ind is naturally uninterrupted.

original: rjes su chags pa pa dang khong khro ba spong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: rjes su chags pa pa dang khong khro ba spong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one abandons attachment and aversion.

original: so sor brtags pa sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: so sor brtags pa sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one accomplishes the practice of discernment.

original: nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one abandons the pride of thinking ‚ÄòI.‚Äô

original: gti mug dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: gti mug dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one is free from ignorance.

original: tshad med pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: tshad med pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the patience that is based on the immeasurables.

original: 'di dag ni yid kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu @142b phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni yid kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu @142b phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the mental activity that follows wisdom.

original: de la 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the wisdom that sees the past without impediment?

original: khams la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: khams la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of giving is the investigation of the elements.

original: phung po la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: phung po la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of morality is the investigation of the aggregates.

original: skye mched la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: skye mched la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is the investigation of the sense-spheres.

original: las la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: las la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the investigation of karma.

original: nyon mongs pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of concentration is the investigation of the afflictions.

original: sems la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: sems la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the investigation of the mind.

original: 'di dag ni 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the wisdom that sees the past without impediment.

original: de la ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the wisdom that sees without impediment into the future?

original: 'gro bar tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'gro bar tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one has the idea of going to different places.

original: lta ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: lta ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one has the idea of different views.

original: gang zag tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gang zag tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one has the idea of different people.

original: sbyor ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one has the idea of different applications.

original: skye ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: skye ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this meditation is that one has the idea of different births.

original: rnam par smin pa tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The m aturation of this wisdom is that one has the idea of different m aturations.

original: 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /üîΩde la da ltar byung ba'i dus la @143a *//
analyzed: 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go / de la da ltar byung ba'i dus la @143a *//
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the wisdom that sees without impediment into the future.

original: ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the wisdom that sees without impediment into the present?

original: da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bya ba shes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bya ba shes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The vision of nirvana is the perfection of morality.

original: 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The vision of freedom from desire is the perfection of patience.

original: 'gog pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The vision of cessation is the perfection of effort.

original: mngon sum du bya ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: mngon sum du bya ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The vision of realization is the perfection of meditation.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chud za pa med pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chud za pa med pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The vision of the imperishability of the compounded and the uncompounded is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the vision of unobstructed knowledge of the present.

original: de la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of skill?

original: thabs mkhas pas dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The analysis through skillful means is the perfection of generosity.

original: skyon dang bral bar sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: skyon dang bral bar sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality is the application free from faults.

original: yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience is the dedication.

original: thams cad du thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: thams cad du thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort is the non-obstruction in all things.

original: sems can rnams kyi mos pa 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi mos pa 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation is the holding of the aspirations of all beings.

original: bde ba tshad med pa la 'jug ba thob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i @143b ste; 'di dag ni mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: bde ba tshad med pa la 'jug ba thob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i @143b ste; 'di dag ni mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The wisdom is the attainment of the entrance to immeasurable happiness. These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the wise.

original: de la ji lta ba bzhin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la ji lta ba bzhin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of reality?

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving is the unobstructed wisdom that connects all phenomena to equality.

original: dngos po brgyad mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dngos po brgyad mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality is the seeing of the eight things.

original: lta ba gsal bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lta ba gsal bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the clear vision of the view.

original: gdul bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: gdul bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the vision of the disciples.

original: nye bar sgrub pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: nye bar sgrub pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation is the vision of the accom plishm ent.

original: brda la nges pa'i tshig 'jug par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: brda la nges pa'i tshig 'jug par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the vision of the application of the definitive words of the symbols.

original: 'di dag ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the way things are.

original: de la rang bzhin mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; mi dmigs pas yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; mi dmigs pas yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni /
translated: What are the six paramitas of seeing the nature?

original: dper na mar me mdzad lta bu'i gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //üîΩlus la mi lta ba ni /
analyzed: dper na mar me mdzad lta bu'i gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o // lus la mi lta ba ni /
translated: The param ita of giving is the giving dedicated by non-apprehending, as in the case of Dipamkara.

original: dper na zla 'od kyis bden pa gang gis nga'i mi gces smras pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dper na zla 'od kyis bden pa gang gis nga'i mi gces smras pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the m oral practice of one who does not value his body, as in the case of Candraprabha, who said, ‚ÄúI do not value my body.‚Äù

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the vision of the sam eness of all things.

original: ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig mthong bar khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig mthong bar khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the understanding of the etymological definition of the word ‚Äòregion‚Äô.

original: snying brtse ba mi gtong bar mthong pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩgnyis su @144a *//
analyzed: snying brtse ba mi gtong bar mthong pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o // gnyis su @144a *//
translated: The param ita of m editation is the insight into the never-failing com passion.

original: med pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste //
analyzed: med pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste //
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the non-dualistic abiding.

original: 'di dag ni rang bzhin mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rang bzhin mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of seeing the nature.

original: de la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the karma of the desire realm?

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las dman pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las dman pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the insight into the inferior karma of the desire realm.

original: 'bring mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: 'bring mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the insight into the middling.

original: chen po mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chen po mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the insight into the superior.

original: las zad bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: las zad bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the insight into the exhaustion of karma.

original: las zad par sbyor bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: las zad par sbyor bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditative stability is the insight into the application of the exhaustion of karma.

original: las zad par sbyor ba'i mi skye bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
analyzed: las zad par sbyor ba'i mi skye bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the insight into the non-arising of the application of the exhaustion of karma.

original: 'di dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the desire realm.

original: de la gzugs na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzugs na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the form realm?

original: gzugs kyi rnam par smin pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rnam par smin pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of generosity is the insight into the ripening of form.

original: gzugs kyi rgyu mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩskye ba'i las mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //üîΩskye ba'i las kyi rnam par rtog pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // skye ba'i las mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o // skye ba'i las kyi rnam par rtog pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of discipline is the insight into the cause of form.üîΩThe paramita of patience is the insight into the karma of birth.üîΩThe paramita of diligence is the insight into the concepts of the karma of birth.

original: rnam par smin pa gsal ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa gsal ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditative stability is the insight into the ripening of the karma of birth.

original: dman pa dang dman pa ma yin par @144b mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
analyzed: dman pa dang dman pa ma yin par @144b mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the insight that sees what is inferior and what is not inferior.

original: 'di dag ni gzugs na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni gzugs na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of action in the form realm.

original: de la gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of action in the formless realm?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is the purification of the levels of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: rnam pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of discipline is the discernment of aspects.

original: dmigs pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the discernment of objects.

original: dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of diligence is the sameness of objects.

original: dmigs pa shin tu sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa shin tu sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is the purification of objects.

original: tha dad pa med par ston par mthong ba nas nges par 'byung ba mthong ba'i bar gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa med par ston par mthong ba nas nges par 'byung ba mthong ba'i bar gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the insight that sees the absence of difference, up to the insight that sees deliverance.

original: 'di dag ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the karma of the formless realm.

original: de la dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúNow, what are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the stage of seeing what is white?

original: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la re ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la re ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving that is the absence of hope on the stage of seeing what is white is the perfection of giving.

original: mtshan ma med par ba tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med par ba tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality of attaining the signless is the perfection of morality.

original: rgyun mi 'chad pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of being uninterrupted is the perfection of patience.

original: rnam par lta ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par lta ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of being a view is the perfection of effort.

original: kun du 'phel pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: kun du 'phel pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation that is increasing is the perfection of meditation.

original: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la chos su 'du shes shing sems can gyi 'du shes med pa gang yin pa @145a *//
analyzed: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la chos su 'du shes shing sems can gyi 'du shes med pa gang yin pa @145a *//
translated: The wisdom of having the perception of phenomena on the stage of seeing what is white, but not having the perception of sentient beings,

original: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
translated: is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the stage of seeing what is white.

original: de la rigs kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na rigs kyi chos mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de la rigs kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na rigs kyi chos mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the Dharma of the family? The m aturation of this giving is that one sees the Dharma of the family.

original: 'bring po mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩsred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni /üîΩbzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'bring po mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni / bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one sees the m iddle.üîΩThe m aturation of this patience is that one sees craving.

original: rigs las nyams pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rigs las nyams pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one sees the family.

original: rigs yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rigs yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this meditation is that one com pletes the family.

original: brgyad pa'i chos rab tu 'thob pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
analyzed: brgyad pa'i chos rab tu 'thob pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
translated: The m aturation of this p√†ram it√† of wisdom is that one attains the m ind of the Dharma of the eighth.

original: 'di dag ni rigs kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rigs kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the Dharma of the family.

original: de la brgyad pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin ba drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brgyad pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin ba drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the Dharma of the eighth?

original: brgyad pa dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one is a follower of faith in the eighth.

original: brgyad pa chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;brgyad pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;brgyad pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The eighth‚Äôs birth is her patience.

original: brgyad pa dgra bcom pa stan gcig pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa dgra bcom pa stan gcig pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The eighth‚Äôs single-seated arhatship is her effort.

original: brgyad pa rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gnas pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gnas pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The eighth‚Äôs abiding in the result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner, and the result of non-returner is her meditation.

original: gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba gang gis so @145b so yang dag par rig sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /üîΩ'di dag ni brgyad pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba gang gis so @145b so yang dag par rig sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste / 'di dag ni brgyad pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The eighth‚Äôs establishing the analytical knowledges of one who is liberated from both aspects is her perfection of wisdom.üîΩThese are the six perfections of the eighth.

original: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúNow, what are the six perfections of the Dharma of the stream enterer?

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi lam la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi lam la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The path of the dharmas of the stream-enterer is the perfection of giving.

original: rno bar rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: rno bar rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The sharp realization is the perfection of morality.

original: de ltar thogs na lan bdun pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de ltar thogs na lan bdun pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The one who is obstructed for seven lives is the perfection of patience.

original: rigs nas rigs su skye pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rigs nas rigs su skye pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The one who is born from family to family is the perfection of effort.

original: bar chad gcig pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bar chad gcig pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The one who is obstructed only once is the perfection of concentration.

original: zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
analyzed: zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
translated: The one who has entered is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the dharmas of the stream-enterer.

original: de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of the dharmas of the once-returner?

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la nyon mongs pa chud par mthong pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la nyon mongs pa chud par mthong pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The seeing of the destruction of afflictions in the once-returner is the perfection of giving.

original: nyon mongs pa rno bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩlas chud par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //üîΩlas la sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rno bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // las chud par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o // las la sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one sees the sharpness of the passions.üîΩThe m aturation of this patience is that one sees the loss of karma.üîΩThe m aturation of this effort is that one sees the craving for karma.

original: bul ba nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bul ba nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one sees the slowness of karma.

original: lhag par sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /üîΩ'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong @146a *//
analyzed: lhag par sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste / 'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong @146a *//
translated: The m aturation of this param ita of wisdom is that one sees the craving for the higher.

original: ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the Once-Returner.

original: de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the Non-Returner?

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'dod chags spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'dod chags spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one abandons the desire of the desire realm.

original: mi lta ba'i sems dang di'i ngo bo ma yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: mi lta ba'i sems dang di'i ngo bo ma yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one has the m ind of non-view and the nature of non-return.

original: srid pa bzang por skye ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: srid pa bzang por skye ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the patience of one who is born in a good existence.

original: shin tu mthong bar skye ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: shin tu mthong bar skye ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the effort of one who is born in the heaven of the Highest Gods.

original: 'og min du skye ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'og min du skye ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation is the m editation of one who is born in the heaven of the Highest Gods.

original: skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba drug gi shes pa thag ring ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba drug gi shes pa thag ring ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the w isdom of one who has the knowledge of the six destinies of the holy being.

original: 'di dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the non-returner.

original: de la dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the Arhat?

original: dgra bcom pa yongs su nyams pa'i chos la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa yongs su nyams pa'i chos la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the giving of one who has the Dharma of complete degeneration.

original: yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the morality of one who has the Dharma of non-degeneration.

original: dad pas mos pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dad pas mos pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the patience of one who is devoted to faith.

original: shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The wisdom of the one liberated by wisdom is the perfection of wisdom.

original: lus kyis mngon du byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: lus kyis mngon du byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The physical realization of the one liberated by both means is the perfection of meditation.

original: gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba las rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab @146b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba las rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab @146b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
translated: The realization of the one liberated from both aspects is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the qualities of an arhat.

original: de la rang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of a pratyekabuddha?

original: rang sangs rgyas la yid byung ba chud bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas la yid byung ba chud bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving of a pratyekabuddha is the seeing of the disgust of a pratyekabuddha.

original: yid byung nas 'byol ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: yid byung nas 'byol ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality of a pratyekabuddha is the disgust of a pratyekabuddha.

original: gcig bul dga' ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gcig bul dga' ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of a pratyekabuddha is the delight in being alone.

original: thar pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: thar pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of a pratyekabuddha is the delight in liberation.

original: zhi gnas la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: zhi gnas la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: That which is based on serenity is the perfection of meditative absorption.

original: gcig bu spobs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: gcig bu spobs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: That which is confident, alone, is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the Solitary Sages.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of the bodhisattvas?

original: g-yo med ben sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o //üîΩlhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs pa'i sbyar ba ni dper na /
analyzed: g-yo med ben sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o // lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs pa'i sbyar ba ni dper na /
translated: The perfection of generosity of those who are without deceit is the perfection of generosity.

original: ngang pa'i skyes pa'i rabs lta pu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩsems can thams cad sems mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: ngang pa'i skyes pa'i rabs lta pu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // sems can thams cad sems mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline of those who are without deceit is the perfection of moral discipline.üîΩThe perfection of patience of those who are without deceit is the perfection of patience.

original: shes pa thams cad rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: shes pa thams cad rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of effort of those who are without deceit is the perfection of effort.

original: gzhan gyis bsgrags pa las brten nas snyoms par 'jug pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis bsgrags pa las brten nas snyoms par 'jug pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of meditative absorption of those who are without deceit is the perfection of meditative absorption.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom of those who are without deceit is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'khor ba na yongs su skyo ba med pa'i shes pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba na yongs su skyo ba med pa'i shes pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom is the knowledge that is not discouraged by samsara and the bringing of sentient beings to maturity.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /üîΩde la zad pa shes @147a *//
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go / de la zad pa shes @147a *//
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the bodhisattva.

original: pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs distinguished by the knowledge of destruction?

original: zad pa shes pa la thogs pa med par sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: zad pa shes pa la thogs pa med par sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The generosity is the application to the knowledge of destruction without obstruction.

original: sbyor ba cha phra ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba cha phra ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality is the application to the subtle.

original: mtshan nyid med pa la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience is the application to the signless.

original: yongs su gcod pa'i dmigs pa la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa'i dmigs pa la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort is the application to the objective of complete discernment.

original: me lta bar sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: me lta bar sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation is the application to the fire-like.

original: mi shes pa thams cad dang bral zhing shes pa thams cad rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: mi shes pa thams cad dang bral zhing shes pa thams cad rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is when one is free from all ignorance and has attained all knowledge.

original: 'di dag ni zad pa shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni zad pa shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections distinguished by the knowledge of elimination.

original: de la mi skye ba shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi skye ba shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections distinguished by the knowledge of non-arising?

original: srid pa'i rtsa ba dgu po dag mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtsa ba dgu po dag mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of giving is the knowledge that the nine roots of existence do not arise.

original: gnod sems kyi dngos po dgu mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: gnod sems kyi dngos po dgu mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the knowledge that the nine things related to malice do not arise.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the knowledge that the worldly dharmas are not destroyed.

original: rnam par thar pa yongs su ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa yongs su ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the knowledge that the liberations are not lost.

original: mi slob pa'i shes pa bcu po dag mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: mi slob pa'i shes pa bcu po dag mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is the knowledge that the ten knowledges of the non-learner are seen.

original: yongs su gcod pa la 'gyur ba med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa la 'gyur ba med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the unvarying perception of the definitive.

original: 'di dag ni mi skye ba shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mi skye ba shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the knowledge of the unborn.

original: de la byin gyi @147b rlabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byin gyi @147b rlabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of blessing?

original: dam pa'i chos ma nub kyi bar du chos thams cad gnas pa dang / bstan pa la zang zing gis mchod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ma nub kyi bar du chos thams cad gnas pa dang / bstan pa la zang zing gis mchod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of giving is the support of all the teachings and the worship of the teachings with material things until the holy Dharma has disappeared.

original: bstan pa zil gyis mi non pa gang yin de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: bstan pa zil gyis mi non pa gang yin de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of morality is the invincibility of the teachings.

original: 'jig rten gyi rigs bzhi dang par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rigs bzhi dang par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is the support of the four castes of the world.

original: mngon par brtson pa 'bras bu dang bcas par rtsol pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: mngon par brtson pa 'bras bu dang bcas par rtsol pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the effort that is fruitful through being applied.

original: bsam pa des pas chos mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bsam pa des pas chos mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditation is the realization of the Dharma through a pure intention.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
translated: The knowledge of all worldly phenomena is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni byin gyi rlabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni byin gyi rlabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of consecration.

original: de la lha'i mig sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lha'i mig sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the accomplishment of the divine eye?

original: lha'i mig gis gzugs can mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //üîΩgzugs can ma /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis gzugs can mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o // gzugs can ma /
translated: The seeing of form with the divine eye is the result of giving.

original: yin pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: yin pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The seeing of formlessness is the result of morality.

original: sgro btags pa med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sgro btags pa med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The seeing of non-superimposition is the result of patience.
