original: 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The seeing of the faults of cyclic existence is the result of effort.

original: nges par 'byung ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The seeing of definite emergence is the result of concentration.

original: nye bar zhi ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The seeing of peace is the result of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni lha'i mig sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lha'i mig sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the accomplishment of the divine eye.

original: de la lha'i rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lha'i rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the divine ear?

original: sgra che ba nyan pa @148a gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sgra che ba nyan pa @148a gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one hears the great sounds.

original: sgra chud pa nyan pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sgra chud pa nyan pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one hears the sounds that are not lost.

original: byams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: byams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one hears all the sounds of love.

original: thabs kyi tshig sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi tshig sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one gives the words of the m eans.

original: 'du byed rnams thos nas kun du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams thos nas kun du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one hears the com ponents of existence and then holds them.

original: sgra thams cad dpyod pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: sgra thams cad dpyod pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one engages in the analysis of all sounds.

original: 'di dag ni lha'i rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lha'i rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the divine ear.

original: de la sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; sems kyi rang bzhin mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de la sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; sems kyi rang bzhin mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the knowledge of the various thoughts of others? The m aturation of this giving is that one sees the nature of the mind.

original: sems la dge ba dang mi dge bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems la dge ba dang mi dge bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one sees the mind as virtuous and non-virtuous.

original: sems gyi rgyu dang rkyen mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems gyi rgyu dang rkyen mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one sees the causes and conditions of the m ind.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one sees the past and the future.

original: da ltar 'byung ba la mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: da ltar 'byung ba la mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one sees the equality of the present.

original: thams cad du rgyu bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes bar kyi ste /
analyzed: thams cad du rgyu bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes bar kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one sees the m ind as moving everywhere.

original: 'di dag ni sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the knowledge of the m ind of others.

original: de la sngon gyi gnas mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sngon gyi gnas mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the knowledge of former lives?

original: sngon gyi gnas na dben pa'i dmigs pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas na dben pa'i dmigs pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one sees the objective reference of the former life as being isolated.

original: skye ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims @148b kyi'o; ;'gro bar 'jug pa med pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: skye ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims @148b kyi'o; ;'gro bar 'jug pa med pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The morality is the reflection on birth. The patience is the reflection on the non-entry into going.

original: de lta bu la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //üîΩde ltar bdag med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: de lta bu la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o // de ltar bdag med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The effort is the reflection on the non-existence of the self.üîΩThe meditation is the seeing of the selflessness of that.

original: rnam pas lung 'bog pa mthong gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: rnam pas lung 'bog pa mthong gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom is the seeing of the non-existence of the self in the elements.

original: 'di dag ni sngon gyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sngon gyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the knowledge of former existences.

original: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the knowledge of magical powers?

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving is the attainment of the power of magical transformation.

original: dmigs pa tha dad pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa tha dad pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality is the non-differentiation of the objective supports.

original: sems can rnams la snying rjes rnam par 'phrul pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams la snying rjes rnam par 'phrul pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience is the magical transformation through compassion for sentient beings.

original: thams cad du thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: thams cad du thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one is unobstructed in all things.

original: yid kyi las mi ldog pha gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: yid kyi las mi ldog pha gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one‚Äôs m ental activity is irreversible.

original: zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one is not overwhelmed.

original: 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of m iraculous abilities.

original: de la zag pa zad par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zag pa zad par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the knowledge of the exhaustion of the outflows?

original: zag par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: zag par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one sees the outflows.

original: zag pa kun 'byung bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩzag pa 'gog par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: zag pa kun 'byung bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // zag pa 'gog par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one sees the arising of the outflows.üîΩThe m aturation of this patience is that one sees the cessation of the outflows.

original: zag pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: zag pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one sees the path leading to the cessation of the outflows.

original: 'di nyid du zag ba bcu ma lus par 'gog par lta pa gang yin pa de ni @149a *//üîΩbsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid du zag ba bcu ma lus par 'gog par lta pa gang yin pa de ni @149a *//üîΩbsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one sees the cessation of the ten outflows w ithout exception.üîΩThe m aturation of this w isdom is that one sees the exhaustion of the outflows.

original: 'di nyid du zag pa bcom nas mi snang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab gyi ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid du zag pa bcom nas mi snang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab gyi ste /
translated: That which is the destruction of the defilements here and now and the disappearance of the body is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni zag pa zad pa shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni zag pa zad pa shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the knowledge of the destruction of the defilements.

original: de la spyod lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la spyod lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of deportment?üîΩThe deportment that is pleasing to many people is the perfection of giving.

original: skye bo mang po dang par byed pa'i spyod lam gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;kun nas mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: skye bo mang po dang par byed pa'i spyod lam gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;kun nas mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: That which is completely beautiful is the perfection of morality.

original: rgyun mi 'chad par bltas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par bltas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: That which is uninterrupted in its gaze is the perfection of patience.

original: gom pa 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: gom pa 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: That which is the placing of the foot is the perfection of effort.

original: spyod lam ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: spyod lam ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: That which is the undiminished deportment is the perfection of meditation.

original: spyod lam ma bcos pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: spyod lam ma bcos pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: That which is the uncontrived deportment is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni spyod lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni spyod lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of deportment.

original: de la phan par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phan par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of wishing to benefit others?

original: spyod pa yang par zang zing len pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: spyod pa yang par zang zing len pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that I take on the material things of those who are not generous.

original: sems can ma rungs ba dag la skyabs byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems can ma rungs ba dag la skyabs byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that I am a refuge for those who are not good.

original: mu stegs can rnams kyi gnod pa gzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mu stegs can rnams kyi gnod pa gzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that I endure the harm of the tƒ´rthikas.

original: 'di ltar gdul kha'i phyir dga' bo lta'i nang du son pa dang / 'di ltar pad ma'i snying po'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar gdul kha'i phyir dga' bo lta'i nang du son pa dang / 'di ltar pad ma'i snying po'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that I am like Nanda, who entered the realm of the nƒÅgas, and that I am like the lotus in the center of the lake.

original: gdul ba'i phyir bzang brtsams sgom pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: gdul ba'i phyir bzang brtsams sgom pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this meditation is that I am like the one who meditated on the good beginning in order to be tamed.

original: 'di ltar @149b lnga pa'i nang nas kun shes snying rjes nye bar 'ongs te chos bstan pa dang / 'di ltar bden pa blta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar @149b lnga pa'i nang nas kun shes snying rjes nye bar 'ongs te chos bstan pa dang / 'di ltar bden pa blta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this wisdom is that I am like the one who, from the fifth, came forth with the compassion of omniscience and taught the Dharma, and that I am like the one who saw the truth.

original: 'di dag ni phan par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni phan par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of wishing to benefit.

original: de la nyon mongs pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of being without afflictions?

original: nyon mongs pas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving that is not afflicted by weariness is the perfection of giving.

original: dbang rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dbang rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality of attaining mastery is the perfection of morality.

original: gnod sems med par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gnod sems med par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of remaining without malice is the perfection of patience.

original: mos pa la yon spyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: mos pa la yon spyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of engaging in the practice of interest is the perfection of effort.

original: mngon par zhen pa med par rtag tu sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa med par rtag tu sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation of always applying oneself without clinging is the perfection of meditation.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom of remaining as one wishes is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa yid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa yid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of being without afflictions.

original: de la che'i 'du byed 'dor ba la dbang sgyur pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la che'i 'du byed 'dor ba la dbang sgyur pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of controlling the great formative forces?

original: tshe 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: tshe 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving up of life is the giving of generosity.

original: bor nas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: bor nas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The giving up of the place is the morality of morality.

original: mtshams bcad pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mtshams bcad pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving up of the boundary is the patience of patience.

original: lta bar song ba'i srid pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: lta bar song ba'i srid pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The giving up of all existence that is gone to view is the effort of effort.

original: sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir gtang ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir gtang ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The giving up of the maturation of sentient beings is the meditation of meditation.

original: sems can yin byung pa rnams gdul ba'i phyir btang pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: sems can yin byung pa rnams gdul ba'i phyir btang pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The giving up of the sentient beings who have arisen is the wisdom of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba la dbang sgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug @150a *//
analyzed: 'di dag ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba la dbang sgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug @150a *//
translated: These are the six perfections of the mastery of giving up the life-formations.

original: go / de la mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: go / de la mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of nirvana?

original: len pa med par mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: len pa med par mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The nirvana without grasping is the giving of giving.

original: sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that I was empowered by the mind.

original: 'od srung chen po mthong bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'od srung chen po mthong bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of this patience is that I was able to see the great light.

original: stong gsum g-yo bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: stong gsum g-yo bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this effort is that I was able to shake the three thousand worlds.

original: sems la 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sems la 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this meditation is that I was able to place my mind.

original: ring bsrel sel bud blags pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: ring bsrel sel bud blags pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The maturation of this wisdom is that I was able to distribute the relics.

original: 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: de la cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of miracles?

original: phyogs tha dad pa dag tu sku gdung rnams 'thor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: phyogs tha dad pa dag tu sku gdung rnams 'thor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving is that the relics were scattered in different directions.

original: sku gdung gi cho 'phrul gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sku gdung gi cho 'phrul gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that there were miracles of the relics.

original: sems can rnams dang bar phyed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams dang bar phyed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of this patience is that I was able to bring sentient beings to maturity.

original: cho 'phrul la lta rnams spro bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //üîΩspu zing zhes byed cing mchi ma 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: cho 'phrul la lta rnams spro bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o // spu zing zhes byed cing mchi ma 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that I delight those who have come to see the miracles.üîΩThe m aturation of this m editation is that the hair of those who see the miracles stands on end and they shed tears.

original: bden pa'i chog gis ring bsrel las cho 'phrul 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: bden pa'i chog gis ring bsrel las cho 'phrul 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that the relics perform miracles by the power of the truth.

original: 'di dag ni cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the miracles.

original: de la bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the analysis of the teachings?üîΩThe m aturation of this giving is that one obtains the highest gain.

original: rnyed ba rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin @150b pa'i 'o; ;kha na mtho ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: rnyed ba rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin @150b pa'i 'o; ;kha na mtho ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that there is nothing to be ashamed of.

original: zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one is not overwhelmed.

original: ji tsam du lta dang mis bstan pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: ji tsam du lta dang mis bstan pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one obtains the teachings of the view.

original: bdud kyis bltar med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bdud kyis bltar med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one is not seen by Mara.

original: bstan pa dang bral bar dga' zhing dang btsam gyis mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: bstan pa dang bral bar dga' zhing dang btsam gyis mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: That which is the delight and joy of one who is free from the teachings and who eventually passes into parinirvana is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the analysis of the teachings.

original: de la ring bsrel rnam par dbye ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ring bsrel rnam par dbye ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the analysis of relics?

original: ring bsrel rnams la yo byad kyis mtshed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: ring bsrel rnams la yo byad kyis mtshed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is the offering of articles to the relics.

original: skye bo mang po dad pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: skye bo mang po dad pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the faith of many beings.

original: ring bsrel gyi mchod rten gzi byin can gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: ring bsrel gyi mchod rten gzi byin can gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the splendor of the reliquary stupas.

original: lha dang mi rnams dga' ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams dga' ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the delight of gods and humans.

original: ring bsrel gyi dmigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: ring bsrel gyi dmigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is the attainment of recollection of the Buddha from the observation of the relics.

original: ring bsrel tshol bas spobs pa yongs su ma nyams pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
analyzed: ring bsrel tshol bas spobs pa yongs su ma nyams pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the one that is obtained by the one who seeks relics and attains complete eloquence.

original: 'di dag ni ring bsrel rnam par dbye pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /üîΩde dag las pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni ring bsrel rnam par dbye pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go / de dag las pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o //
translated: These are the six perfections of the analysis of relics.üîΩTwo thousand one hundred perfections are the teaching of the Dharma for those who practice desire.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni zhe sdang spyod pa rnams la @151a *//üîΩchos bstan pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni zhe sdang spyod pa rnams la @151a *// chos bstan pa'o //
translated: Two thousand one hundred perfections are the teaching of the Dharma for those who practice hatred.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni gti mug spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni gti mug spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o //
translated: Two thousand one hundred perfections are the teaching of the Dharma for those who practice delusion.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa ste /üîΩde dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong bzhi brgya 'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa ste / de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong bzhi brgya 'o //
translated: Two thousand one hundred perfections are the teaching of the Dharma for those who practice evenly.üîΩThese are the eight thousand four hundred perfections.

original: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin kyang brgyad stong bzhi brgya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin kyang brgyad stong bzhi brgya'o //
translated: Their concentrations are also eight thousand four hundred.

original: de dag gi rnam pa la 'jug pa'ang stong stong ste /
analyzed: de dag gi rnam pa la 'jug pa'ang stong stong ste /
translated: The aspects of those are empty, empty.

original: rnam pa brgya brgya po re re'i stong stong po des na /
analyzed: rnam pa brgya brgya po re re'i stong stong po des na /
translated: Each of those one hundred aspects is empty.

original: de dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, they are called the eighty-four thousand perfections.

original: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong sgrub par byed pa ni bdag la phan par brtson pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong sgrub par byed pa ni bdag la phan par brtson pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The attainment of the eighty-four thousand concentrations is called striving for one's own benefit.

original: gzungs brgyad khri bzhi stong ni gzhan sa phan par brtson pa ste /
analyzed: gzungs brgyad khri bzhi stong ni gzhan sa phan par brtson pa ste /
translated: The eighty-four thousand dhƒÅra·πáƒ´s are striving for the benefit of others.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir de ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub po //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir de ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub po //
translated: For omniscience, that is the enlightenment of the Buddha.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po; nges byang chub kyi snying por bdud pa tul te byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de chos la dga' ba'i rnam par smin pas zhag bdun gyi bar du dkyil mo krung ma bshig par 'dug pa la tshangs pas kye
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po; nges byang chub kyi snying por bdud pa tul te byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de chos la dga' ba'i rnam par smin pas zhag bdun gyi bar du dkyil mo krung ma bshig par 'dug pa la tshangs pas kye
translated: MahƒÅrƒÅja PramuditarƒÅja, having subdued MƒÅra at the site of enlightenment and fully awakened to perfect buddhahood, for seven days he remained in the cross-legged posture without moving, delighting in the Dharma. BrahmƒÅ said,

original: ma'o 'jig rten 'di na cha ba 'tshal te /
analyzed: ma'o 'jig rten 'di na cha ba 'tshal te /
translated: Alas! The world is perishing.

original: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas na chos rgya chen po 'di lta bu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang thugs las chud du la thugs mngon par gzhol bar mdzad kyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas na chos rgya chen po 'di lta bu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang thugs las chud du la thugs mngon par gzhol bar mdzad kyi /
translated: In this way, although the TathƒÅgata has fully awakened to this kind of vast Dharma, he is not inclined to teach it.

original: chos bstan pa'i slad du ni ma lags so //
analyzed: chos bstan pa'i slad du ni ma lags so //
translated: He is not inclined to teach the Dharma.‚Äù

original: zhes gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: zhes gsol ba btab bo //
translated: Thus he supplicated.

original: de nas nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug pa'i @151b dpal dang gzi brjid dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mthong ngo //
analyzed: de nas nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug pa'i @151b dpal dang gzi brjid dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mthong ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThen, when I was seated at the site of awakening, the gods of the pure realms saw my splendor and majesty.

original: kha dog dang tshul bzang po dang / kha dog du ma snang ba dang / sku drang por bzhugs pa dang / bkra shis pa dang / tha dad du 'gro bar 'ongs pa dang / kun nas mdzes pa dang / legs par gnas pa dang /
analyzed: kha dog dang tshul bzang po dang / kha dog du ma snang ba dang / sku drang por bzhugs pa dang / bkra shis pa dang / tha dad du 'gro bar 'ongs pa dang / kun nas mdzes pa dang / legs par gnas pa dang /
translated: They saw my excellent complexion and form, my radiant many colors, my upright posture, my auspiciousness, my arrival from different places, my all-around beauty, and my perfect stability.

original: 'od kyi kha dog mchog dang ldan pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / bkod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / bkod pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ye shes kyi bdag nyid chen po dang /
analyzed: 'od kyi kha dog mchog dang ldan pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / bkod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / bkod pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ye shes kyi bdag nyid chen po dang /
translated: He was endowed with the supreme color of light, was beautiful to behold, had an especially exalted arrangement, was exalted above all worlds, had a delightful arrangement, and was the great lord of wisdom.

original: blta na dkon pa dang / gzi byin mtha' yas pa dang / snyan par grags pa dang / mkhyen bzhin du kha dog mdzes par snang ba dag kyang mthong nas de'i tshe spyan sngar 'khod de zhes dang bcas pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
analyzed: blta na dkon pa dang / gzi byin mtha' yas pa dang / snyan par grags pa dang / mkhyen bzhin du kha dog mdzes par snang ba dag kyang mthong nas de'i tshe spyan sngar 'khod de zhes dang bcas pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
translated: He was difficult to behold, had infinite splendor, was renowned as pleasant, and, while knowing, appeared to have a beautiful complexion. Having seen this, they sat down in his presence and with devotion recited these verses:

original: bdud btul nyon mongs pa dag rnam bcom zhing //
analyzed: bdud btul nyon mongs pa dag rnam bcom zhing //
translated: ‚ÄúYou have subdued MƒÅra and conquered the afflictions,

original: stong gsum po'i sa gzhig yo mdzad la //
analyzed: stong gsum po'i sa gzhig yo mdzad la //
translated: And caused the ground of the trichiliocosm to quake.

original: ngan song sa yi sdug bsngal spangs nas kyang //
analyzed: ngan song sa yi sdug bsngal spangs nas kyang //
translated: Having eliminated the sufferings of the lower realms,

original: byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa kun du mdzes //
analyzed: byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa kun du mdzes //

original: lhun po ri dang 'dra bar mi g-yo bar //

translated: You radiate light rays into all the buddhafields.üîΩProtector, you sit resplendent at the foot of the lord of trees.

original: skyil mo krung mchog mnyam bzhag dbang po yis //
analyzed: skyil mo krung mchog mnyam bzhag dbang po yis //
translated: You sit in the supreme cross-legged posture, your senses in equipoise.

original: sengge lta bu mi g-yo ba zhugs mdzad cing //
analyzed: sengge lta bu mi g-yo ba zhugs mdzad cing //

original: gong na med par bdag nyid gzigs pa na //
analyzed: gong na med par bdag nyid gzigs pa na //

original: mgon po rgyal ba'i gdan la lhang der bzhugs //

original: 'jig rten las ni 'dod pa zhi mdzad pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten las ni 'dod pa zhi mdzad pa //

original: sva la'i mchog dbang drung na lhang der bzhugs //
analyzed: sva la'i mchog dbang drung na lhang der bzhugs //

original: sbyor mnyam mnyam pa nyid kyis bzhugs mdzad cing //
analyzed: sbyor mnyam mnyam pa nyid kyis bzhugs mdzad cing //

original: 'jig rten phan par bden tshul dgongs pa po //
analyzed: 'jig rten phan par bden tshul dgongs pa po //

original: bden pa'i dbang phyug bstan pa dgongs pa na //
analyzed: bden pa'i dbang phyug bstan pa dgongs pa na //
translated: You are the lord of truth, contemplating the teaching.

original: mgon po rgyal ba'i gdan la lhang nger bzhugs //
analyzed: mgon po rgyal ba'i gdan la lhang nger bzhugs //
translated: Protector, you sit resplendent on the Victor‚Äôs seat.

original: dus gsum chos kyi de nyid dgongs mdzad cing //
analyzed: dus gsum chos kyi de nyid dgongs mdzad cing //
translated: You are contemplating the suchness of the phenomena of the three times.

original: 'gro ba tshogs gsum dag tu mdzad pa na /

analyzed: thugs chud gsung pa zla ba lhang der bzhugs //

original: sems can mkhas pa 'jig rten dam pa ste //
analyzed: sems can mkhas pa 'jig rten dam pa ste //

original: sum cu gnyis mtshan ldan pa gzugs mchog mnga'//
analyzed: sum cu gnyis mtshan ldan pa gzugs mchog mnga'//
translated: Endowed with the thirty-two marks, possessing supreme form.üîΩGreat sage, the world is ugly,

analyzed: drang srong chen po 'jig rten mi sdug pa // tshangs pa yi chad dngos kyis nyer mchis na //
translated: And BrahmƒÅ is not near.üîΩ‚ÄúPlease look upon the world that has fallen into the three fires.

analyzed: me gsum lhung ba'i 'jig rten gzigs su gsol; ;khyod kyis byang chub yan lag grus bstan gsol //

original: khyod gyis bdud rtsi'i char dbab dus 'di lags //
analyzed: khyod gyis bdud rtsi'i char dbab dus 'di lags //
translated: This is the time for you to rain down the nectar.üîΩ‚ÄúPlease look upon beings who are dwelling on the path of MƒÅra,

original: 'du shes log pa long ba rab nyams pa'i //üîΩskye rgu bdud lam gnas pa gzigs su gsol //
analyzed: 'du shes log pa long ba rab nyams pa'i // skye rgu bdud lam gnas pa gzigs su gsol //

original: ston khyod mig ldan gzhan du mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: ston khyod mig ldan gzhan du mi 'gyur ba //

original: khyod kyis dus 'dir thugs @152b rje bskyed du gsol //üîΩmu stegs ngan 'gro g-yang sa chen po yi //üîΩsrid pa'i rgya mtshos skye dgu 'di khyer rnams //
analyzed: khyod kyis dus 'dir thugs @152b rje bskyed du gsol // mu stegs ngan 'gro g-yang sa chen po yi // srid pa'i rgya mtshos skye dgu 'di khyer rnams //
translated: You should generate compassion at this time.üîΩThese beings are carried away by the ocean of existenceüîΩInto the great abyss of the lower realms of non-Buddhists.

analyzed: sems can srid mtsho las 'don 'gro ba'i don //

analyzed: 'jig tshogs ltas bcings skye dgu 'di dag rnams //

analyzed: sems can kha sgyur ci slad grol mi mdzad // nyon mongs dbang gis log par rab bsong la //
translated: Why do you not liberate them, turning them away from sa·πÉsƒÅra?üîΩFor a long time they have been asleep, covered by obscurations,

analyzed: yun ring gnyid log sgrib pas khebs pa rnams // tshul khrims brtul shugs bstan pa'i ting 'dzin 'thob //

analyzed: chos kyi rnga sgra ci slad bsgrags mi bgyid // 'jig rten dag na dbul gyur 'gro ba'i rnams //
translated: And attain the samƒÅdhi of the teaching of discipline and austerity?üîΩIn the world, beings are poor,

translated: His principal attendant will be known as Fine Mind; the follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Source of Dharma;üîΩthe follower foremost in miraculous abilities will be known as Strength of Merit.üîΩIn his first assembly will be 700 million disciples;üîΩin the second, 690 million;üîΩin the third, 780 million.üîΩHis life will span 77,000 years,üîΩand the holy Dharma will remain a further 60,000 years.üîΩHis relics will be extensive.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par tog skye ba'i yul ni grong khyer gzi brjid gsa' ba zhes bya'o //üîΩrigs ni rgyal rigs so //üîΩ'od ni dpag tshad sum bcu'o //üîΩyab ni rab gsal shes bya'o //üîΩyum ni sva la can nas bya'o //üîΩsras ni me tog @168a *//üîΩbla ma zhes bya'o //
translated: His father‚Äôs nam e will be Fine Mind; his m other‚Äôs nam e will be Lady of the Moon. His son will be called Joy of the Gods; his principal attendant will be known as Fine Mind. The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Source of Dharma; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Strength of Merit. In his first assembly will be 700 million disciples; in the second assembly will be 600 million and 90 million; in the third assembly will be 700 million and 80 million. His life will span seventy-seven thousand years, and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further sixty thousand years. His relics will be extensive. The Tathagata M anikantha will have as birthplace the city called Brilliant. He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for thirty yojanas. His father‚Äôs nam e will be Clear Mind; his m other‚Äôs nam e will be Lady of the Moon. His son will be called Flower; his principal attendant will be known as Best of Flowers.
